name: Red Nights
description:
Red Nights is a 2.5D SideScroller with a strong stealth components.

It is being developed using Unreal Engine 4. 

The objective of the player is to move towards the end of each level solving ambiental platforming puzzles, avoiding/fighting enemies.

The player will be in the shoes of a vampire of the ventrue clan, Erina, and will have the opportunity to choose how to deal with the various enemies and obstacles, opting for a more stealth mode hiding and trying to kill as little as possible, or "give in to the beast".

This game has been made following the "World of Darkness Unbound" initiative and, as such, following its guidelines.
